dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP service through network scanning
FTP anonymous access leads to discovering user credentials

scenario.title: DataVault Industries File Server Breach
scenario.description: DataVault Industries runs a legacy FTP server for internal file sharing. Recent security audits revealed potential vulnerabilities in their file transfer protocols. Your task is to assess the security of their FTP infrastructure and retrieve sensitive data that may be exposed.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover FTP service on target
Enumerate FTP service and test for anonymous access
Exploit FTP misconfigurations to gain authenticated access
Navigate directory structure to locate and retrieve the flag
